title: Para-Cyclist Uses Last Ride Before Elective Double Leg Amputation to Raise Money for Others
content:
British para-cyclist Tom Staniford chose to help others in what was his last ride before the excruciating decision to have a double leg amputation.

Read the full article at Para-Cyclist Uses Last Ride Before Elective Double Leg Amputation to Raise Money for Others on Velo.
